CongB

Korean: 콩비

Hometown:

Sơn Tây, Hà Nội

Country:

Vietnam

Full name:
Nguyen Thanh Cong
Native name:
Nguyễn Thành Công
Birthday:
Dec 8, 2000
Age:
24 years old
Height:
5'9" (174 cm)

Introduction

CongB is a Vietnamese Singer under Mustation Entertainment. He is best known for being a contestant on the reality survival show Boys Planet.

On December 29, he was introduced as a contestant on Boys Planet, which aired on February 2. On March 23, he was eliminated in episode 8 after ranking 43rd place. On April 25, he was introduced as the new artist of Mustation Entertainment in Vietnam. On May 22, he changed his stage name to CONGB (콩비) and prepared for his debut.

On October 26, he announced that he would release a Pre-Debut Single called 'Em Đợi Anh Lâu Chưa?' on December 16th, 2023.
